_comment: Saved Queries for OR1200 Knowledge Graph Demo
_note: Import these documents into the _editor_saved_queries collection

queries.title: Architectural Traceability - High-Level Design Links
queries.content:
FOR component IN UNION(BusInterface, ClockDomain, FSM_StateMachine, RTL_Memory)
  FOR entity, edge, path IN 1..1 OUTBOUND component RESOLVED_TO
    RETURN path
queries.description: Show semantic bridges between high-level architectural design constructs and documentation

queries.title: Graph Overview - Sample From All Collections
queries.content:
LET modules = (FOR m IN RTL_Module LIMIT 5 RETURN m)
LET ports = (FOR p IN RTL_Port LIMIT 10 RETURN p)
LET entities = (FOR e IN OR1200_Golden_Entities LIMIT 10 RETURN e)
LET commits = (FOR c IN GitCommit SORT c.timestamp DESC LIMIT 3 RETURN c)
FOR item IN UNION(modules, ports, entities, commits)
  RETURN item
queries.description: Load a representative sample from each major collection type to show graph diversity

queries.title: CPU Module Hierarchy
queries.content:
FOR v, e, p IN 1..3 OUTBOUND
  "RTL_Module/or1200_cpu"
  GRAPH "OR1200_Knowledge_Graph"
  FILTER e.type == "CONTAINS"
  RETURN p
queries.description: Show the hierarchical containment tree starting from the main CPU module

queries.title: Top Scoring Semantic Links
queries.content:
FOR edge IN RESOLVED_TO
  SORT edge.score DESC
  LIMIT 20
  RETURN {
    vertices: [DOCUMENT(edge._from), DOCUMENT(edge._to)],
    edges: [edge]
  }
queries.description: Display the highest-confidence semantic bridges between RTL and specifications

queries.title: Top Scoring Semantic Links (Data View)
queries.content:
FOR edge IN RESOLVED_TO
  SORT edge.score DESC
  LIMIT 20
  RETURN {
    rtl_element: DOCUMENT(edge._from).label,
    doc_entity: DOCUMENT(edge._to).entity_name,
    score: edge.score,
    method: edge.method
  }
queries.description: Analyze semantic bridge quality (returns data, not paths for visualization)

queries.title: Recent Commits and Modified Modules
queries.content:
FOR commit IN GitCommit
  SORT commit.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 5
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 OUTBOUND commit
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "MODIFIED"
    RETURN p
queries.description: Show recent commits and the modules they affected

queries.title: Find Module Ports and Signals
queries.content:
FOR module IN RTL_Module
  FILTER CONTAINS(LOWER(module.label), LOWER(@moduleName))
  LIMIT 1
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 OUTBOUND module
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type IN ["HAS_PORT", "HAS_SIGNAL"]
    LIMIT 50
    RETURN p
queries.description: Display the interface (ports and signals) of a specific module

queries.title: Find Entity by Name (Specification Search)
queries.content:
FOR entity IN OR1200_Golden_Entities
  FILTER CONTAINS(LOWER(entity.entity_name), LOWER(@searchTerm))
     OR CONTAINS(LOWER(entity.description), LOWER(@searchTerm))
  LIMIT 10
  RETURN entity
queries.description: Search for specification entities by name or description

queries.title: ALU Semantic Network
queries.content:
FOR alu IN RTL_Module
  FILTER alu.label == "or1200_alu"
  FOR entity, resEdge, resPath IN 1..1 OUTBOUND alu
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER resEdge.type == "RESOLVED_TO"
    FOR related, relEdge, relPath IN 1..1 ANY entity
      OR1200_Golden_Relations
      FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("OR1200_Golden_Entities", related)
      LIMIT 10
      RETURN relPath
queries.description: Show ALU module with connected specification entities and their relationships

queries.title: Commits Affecting a Component
queries.content:
FOR module IN RTL_Module
  FILTER CONTAINS(LOWER(module.label), LOWER(@componentName))
  LIMIT 1
  FOR commit, edge, path IN 1..1 INBOUND module
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER edge.type == "MODIFIED"
    SORT commit.timestamp DESC
    RETURN path
queries.description: Show Git commit history for a specific hardware component

queries.title: Port Wiring Diagram
queries.content:
FOR module IN RTL_Module
  FILTER module.label == "or1200_cpu"
  FOR port IN 1..1 OUTBOUND module HAS_PORT
    FOR targetPort, wireEdge, wirePath IN 1..1 ANY port WIRED_TO
      LIMIT 30
      RETURN wirePath
queries.description: Show structural wiring connections between CPU ports

queries.title: Entity Neighborhood (Specification Context)
queries.content:
FOR entity IN OR1200_Golden_Entities
  FILTER entity.entity_name == @entityName
  FOR related, edge, path IN 1..2 ANY entity
    OR1200_Golden_Relations
    LIMIT 25
    RETURN path
queries.description: Show the relationship context around a specification entity

queries.title: Impact Analysis - Commits Affecting ALU Specs
queries.content:
FOR commit IN GitCommit
  FILTER commit.author == "Julius Baxter"
  SORT commit.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 3
  FOR module, modEdge IN 1..1 OUTBOUND commit
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER modEdge.type == "MODIFIED"
    FILTER CONTAINS(LOWER(module.label), "alu")
    FOR entity, resEdge IN 1..1 OUTBOUND module
      GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
      FILTER resEdge.type == "RESOLVED_TO"
      RETURN {
        commit: commit.hash,
        date: commit.timestamp,
        modified_module: module.label,
        impacted_spec: entity.entity_name,
        confidence: resEdge.score
      }
queries.description: Cross-domain query combining commits, modules, and specifications

queries.title: Clock Domains and CDC Violations
queries.content:
FOR domain IN ClockDomain
  LET crossings = (FOR sig, edge IN 1..1 INBOUND domain CROSSES_DOMAIN RETURN {sig, edge})
  RETURN {
    domain: domain.name,
    crossing_count: LENGTH(crossings),
    crossings: crossings
  }
queries.description: Identify clock domains and potential Clock Domain Crossing (CDC) violations

queries.title: Bus Interface Groups
queries.content:
FOR bus IN BusInterface
  SORT bus.port_count DESC
  LET ports = (FOR p, e IN 1..1 INBOUND bus PART_OF_BUS RETURN p)
  RETURN {
    bus: bus.name,
    type: bus.interface_type,
    ports: ports[*].label
  }
queries.description: Show logical bus groupings and their associated hardware ports

queries.title: Memory Access Analysis
queries.content:
FOR mem IN RTL_Memory
  LET accessors = (FOR logic, edge IN 1..1 INBOUND mem ACCESSES RETURN {logic: logic.label, type: edge.metadata.access_type})
  RETURN {
    memory: mem.name,
    width: mem.width,
    depth: mem.depth,
    accessors: accessors
  }
queries.description: Analyze memory access patterns and identifying which logic blocks read/write to specific memories

queries.title: Hardware Operator Usage
queries.content:
FOR op IN Operator
  COLLECT type = op.operator_type WITH COUNT INTO count
  SORT count DESC
  RETURN { operator: type, instances: count }
queries.description: Summary of arithmetic and logical operators used across the design for resource estimation

_comment: Canvas Actions for OR1200 Knowledge Graph Demo
_note: Import these documents into the _canvasActions collection and create edges in _viewpointActions

actions.title: [RTL_*] Show Entity Resolutions
actions.description: Select RTL_Module/RTL_Port/RTL_Signal: show linked specification entities
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 OUTBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("OR1200_Golden_Entities", v)
    RETURN p

actions.title: [RTL_Module] Show Module Internals
actions.description: Select RTL_Module: show ports and signals
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 OUTBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type IN ["HAS_PORT", "HAS_SIGNAL"]
    LIMIT 30
    RETURN p

actions.title: [OR1200_Golden_Entities] Find Implementing Code
actions.description: Select OR1200_Golden_Entities: show implementing RTL nodes
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 INBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "RESOLVED_TO"
    FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("RTL_Signal", v) 
       OR IS_SAME_COLLECTION("RTL_Port", v)
       OR IS_SAME_COLLECTION("RTL_Module", v)
    RETURN p

actions.title: [RTL_Module] Show Containment Tree
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..2 OUTBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "CONTAINS"
    LIMIT 40
    RETURN p

actions.title: [GitCommit] Show Documentation for Modified Modules
actions.description: Select GitCommit: show affected specification entities
actions.query:
FOR commitNode IN @nodes
  FOR module, modEdge IN 1..1 OUTBOUND commitNode
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER modEdge.type == "MODIFIED"
    FOR entity, resEdge, path IN 1..1 OUTBOUND module
      GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
      FILTER resEdge.type == "RESOLVED_TO"
      RETURN path

actions.title: [OR1200_Golden_Entities] Expand Entity Relationships
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 ANY node
    OR1200_Golden_Relations
    FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("OR1200_Golden_Entities", v)
    LIMIT 20
    RETURN p

actions.title: [RTL_Port] Show Wiring Connections
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 ANY node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "WIRED_TO"
    LIMIT 20
    RETURN p

actions.title: [RTL_Module/Port/Signal] Find Parent Module
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 INBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "CONTAINS" OR e.type == "HAS_PORT" OR e.type == "HAS_SIGNAL"
    FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("RTL_Module", v)
    RETURN p

actions.title: [RTL_Module] Show Commit History
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..1 INBOUND node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    FILTER e.type == "MODIFIED"
    FILTER IS_SAME_COLLECTION("GitCommit", v)
    SORT v.timestamp DESC
    LIMIT 10
    RETURN p

actions.title: [Any] Full Neighborhood (2-hop)
actions.description: Select any node: show everything connected within 2 hops
actions.query:
FOR node IN @nodes
  FOR v, e, p IN 1..2 ANY node
    GRAPH "IC_Knowledge_Graph"
    LIMIT 50
    RETURN p
